scripts.start:db: docker run --rm -p 27017:27017 --name speaky-db --volume speaky-db:/data/db mongo:4.0.10 > '/dev/null' || docker stop speaky-db || true
scripts.build: yarn run build-ts && yarn run lint
scripts.watch: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Mongo,TypeScript,Node" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "yarn run start:db" "yarn run watch-ts" "yarn run watch-node"
scripts.debug: yarn run build && yarn run watch-debug
scripts.watch-debug: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "TypeScript,Node" -c "cyan.bold,green.bold" "yarn run watch-ts" yarn run serve-debug"
